titleStmt.title: To the Parliament of the Comon-Wealth [sic] of England. Fifty nine particulars laid down for the regulating things, and the taking away of oppressing laws, and oppressors, and to ease the oppressed. / By G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Simmons, at the Bull and Mouth near Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
